name: Binary Rift
description:
A game made in 48 hours for the United Game Jam 2020.

This was our second ever game jam that we took part in and our second ever game.
All the assets including music was made by us.

Since the theme of the game was TWO, here is our interpretation of the game
The player controls TWO droids stuck in TWO different dimensions, but joined by a common force. They should collect 10 energy orbs in total, and TWO keys which will open the the portals, allowing them to meet.

Thanks for playing our game hope you enjoy it!

Instagram of the devs:
Programming by: @its_me_arnv
Game Art by: @kpranav21
Game Music by: @_arindamsharma_
